item.title: Rackspace
item.description: Summer internship at Rackspace I was an intern at Rackspace during summer 2016. In a short span developed an end-to-end data connector for managed MongoDB/Elasticsearch ecosystem. A data connector which consumes real-time Twitter feeds and store it in either MongoDB or Elasticsearch instance. Also coded a pre-defined Kibana dashboard template, and POC product tour to enhance user experience. Project details:Twitter-to-Elasticsearch connector Tech Stack: Python, GO, Docker, Apache Mesos/Marathon
